[Home](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/index) &gt; [@wixc3/docs](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/docs)

## docs package

Tool + CLI for docs generation from TSDocs

## Remarks

### Templates
 Site pages includes the following templates from docs-config:

- index.md - main page header

- package.md - packages root page header

- item.md - header for other files

### Macros
 There are many awesome macros you can use in your TDDocs. Using macros look like this \\[\[\[macro and args\]\]\]

Available macros are:

 - \[\[\[gitRepo\]\]\]
 - \[\[\[github\]\]\]
 - \[\[\[githubBuildStatus\]\]\]
 - \[\[\[githubPages\]\]\]
 - \[\[\[h\]\]\]
 - \[\[\[include\]\]\]
 - \[\[\[listMacros\]\]\]
 - \[\[\[npmBadge\]\]\]
 - \[\[\[packageName\]\]\]
 - \[\[\[packageNameUrl\]\]\]
 - \[\[\[rootPackageName\]\]\]
 - \[\[\[unscopedPackageName\]\]\]

## Example 1

<caption>Generate automatically updated github pages</caption>

```bash
yarn add @wixc3/docs
yarn docs init
git push
```

## Example 2

<caption>Build documentation locally</caption>

```bash
yarn docs build
```

## Example 3

<caption>Generate README.md in all packages (after docs build)</caption>

```bash
yarn docs readme
```

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [buildDocs(conf, skipAnalyze, macros)](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/docs.builddocs) | Build docs markdown |

|  [init(config, force, overrideOrigin)](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/docs.init) | <p>Initialize docs pre-requisites:</p><p>- Adds api-extractor.json to packages</p><p>- Adds git pages action</p><p>- Creates configs and templates in docs-config</p> |
